question: [File: aptos-core/storage/indexer_schemas/src/schema/translated_v1_event/mod.rs] [Test Module: test] [Fuzzing Coverage] Does the proptest at line 11-17 in test.rs adequately cover edge cases like u64::MAX, zero values, and boundary conditions for Version and Index? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer_schemas/src/schema/translated_v1_event/mod.rs] [Schema: TranslatedV1EventSchema] [Double-Write Attack] Can an attacker write the same (Version, Index) key twice with different ContractEventV1 values, causing the second write to overwrite the first and lose event data? [File: aptos-core/storage/indexer_schemas/src/schema/translated_v1_event/mod.rs] [Schema: TranslatedV1EventSchema] [Event Source Authentication] Does the schema verify that translated V1 events originated from legitimate V2 events, or can forged translations be inserted? (Critical)
